divs: sighting detailsi was sitting at home browsing the internet (hockey games results) on laptop. it was a windy night out and a few seconds before event, i heard louder sounds outdoors (i tought some army aircraft\jets were circling the skies nearby) and decided to take a peak if i could see a plane. i went to the patio door and looked up in the skies. there were a few clouds but i could see multiples stars. i then noticed one star that was shining a little bit more and focussed on it. after a very brief moment (maybe one second) the star that was still suddenly moved at very high speed towards west. gave me the goosebumps... i also realized that the "noises" were not there anymore. not sure at what moment they stopped. and i figured it could have been the high winds. i went to other windows to try and see it again but it was gone. i looked back a few times during the rest of the evening but saw nothing else. i wondered a bit about what had just happened and if i relly saw what i think i did. i also tought that i could have had an hallucination... still, just thinking about it now, it gives me the goosebumps again.
Summary: Star-like object was still and suddenly speeded up in straight line towards west and vanished
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Gatineau
There were no other sightings in Gatineau on or around January 31st 2013
